alert.note: Alert for Butts; Henry; Newton; Rockdale (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 01 at 5:40PM EDT until July 01 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Rockdale County in north central Georgia... Northeastern Henry County in north central Georgia... Northeastern Butts County in central Georgia... Central Newton County in north central Georgia... * Until 630 PM EDT. * At 539 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Rocky Plains, or near Covington, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... McDonough, Conyers, Covington, Oxford, Porterdale, Stewart, Ola, Worthville, Magnet, Almon, Richardson Park, Starrsville, Fincherville, Kelleytown, Oak Hill and Rocky Plains. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. If you see wind damage...hail or flooding...wait until the storm has passed...and then call the National Weather Service toll free at 1 8 6 6 7 6 3 4 4 6 6 or tweet us your report at NWSATLANTA.
